channel.title: HELIXX collab EP
channel.description:
Hey guys! So this is just an update post for @HELIXX’s EP “HELIXX & FRIENDS EP VOL. 01” that is currently working in progress. To anyone who would like to join the collaboration, please message here so then we can start something up for us to all chat in. So far we have three members, and may need up to around 5 or 6.
We have a Snapchat group for the current members, so if you want to join I’ll message you my SC, but if you don’t have snapchat then we could start a DM on he forums.
If you have any questions also feel free to message here.
Thank you!

item.title: HELIXX collab EP
item.dc:creator: Matik
item.description:
Hey guys! So this is just an update post for @HELIXX’s EP “HELIXX & FRIENDS EP VOL. 01” that is currently working in progress. To anyone who would like to join the collaboration, please message here so then we can start something up for us to all chat in. So far we have three members, and may need up to around 5 or 6.

We have a Snapchat group for the current members, so if you want to join I’ll message you my SC, but if you don’t have snapchat then we could start a DM on he forums.

If you have any questions also feel free to message here.

Thank you!
